comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: My uncle piloted these in WWII in the S Pacific. I think he had 5 shot down. Here he is in New Guinea. www.flickr.com/photos/toots/2075990350/in/set-72157603334...

comment.author: 16612979@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called North American B-25 Mitchells, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: The hangar in the distance says "Fairfax."

comment.author: 50017489@N06
comment._content: One of the best pictures I have seen on Flickr of the B-25 Mitchell, which played a very important role in the second World War.
